name: Arrsteroids
description:
Ever wondered what would happen if you crossed pirates with asteroids, well wonder no more!

A small project that I put together over a few days. The intention was to make asteroids with a twist, in this case it's the classic asteroids gameplay except you can only fire broadside cannons.

Plays best with a controller.

Source available here:
https://bitbucket.org/LordHogFred/arrsteroids/src/master/
